problem3

Class Publication

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem3.Publication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Article, Book

    public class Publication
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a general publication record that stores the title, author(s), published year, and number of citations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Publication()
      An empty constructor for the Publication class.
      Publication(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String[] authors, int publishYear, int citation)
      Creates a new publication record given the details--title, authors, published year, and number of citations.

        public java.lang.Double estimateImpact()
                                throws ImpactEstimationException
        Returns the calculated base estimated impact of the publication as a double.
        Returns:
        the estimated impact of the publication
        Throws:
        ImpactEstimationException - when the publication is over 250 years old
